docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: At the center for the elderly in suburban Berwyn, Ill., Philip Grosshenrich was dispensing safety tips this week to a class of older drivers: Plan your trips for daylight hours. Be aware that arthritis medication can cause drowsiness. Remember that driving too slowly can be as dangerous as driving too fast.

headline.main: Graying of America Prompts New Highway Safety Efforts
